description: BigJig comes with various puzzles and options for customizing your puzzle-solving experience, including the size of the pieces and their shape styles. You can put together jigsaw puzzles packaged with the program ( .JG6 and .JG4 files) and download more from the BigJig website.

When you save your puzzle progress in version 8 of BigJig, the program creates an SV8 file to store the puzzle progress. To create an SV8 file with version 8 of BigJig, click the Menu puzzle piece icon, then select File â†’ Save Game or Save As... .
